About this Site

Rapid Array is written and produced by me, Scott McDowell. It is mainly focused on design, technology, programming, Apple, and the various other subjects that interest me.

Publishing Information

Rapid Array is built with Jekyll and published through GitHub. My go-to text editor is TextMate.

The font used on the majority of this site is Source Sans Pro, created by Paul D. Hunt for Adobe. Raph Levienâ€™s Inconsolata is the resident fixed-width font.
